Heat oil in a pan, sautÃ© garlic and ginger until fragrant. 4. Add pork and stir-fry until it changes color, then add pepper slices and stir-fry. 5. Season with salt, stir well, and serve.

Add pork and stir-fry until it changes color, then add carrot shreds and stir-fry. 5. Season with salt and cook until carrots soften.

Add minced garlic and sautÃ© until fragrant, then add dried tofu and stir-fry. 4. Finally, add leeks, stir-fry quickly, season with soy sauce and salt, and serve.

Ingredients: Pork tenderloin, green onions, sweet bean paste, soy sauce, cooking wine, sugar, cornstarch, cooking oil
Method: 1. Shred pork tenderloin, marinate with cooking wine, soy sauce, and cornstarch for 20 minutes. 2. Shred green onions and set aside. 3. Heat oil in a pan, stir-fry pork shreds quickly until they change color, then remove. 4. Leave some oil in the pan, add sweet bean paste and stir-fry until fragrant, then add sugar and a little water to mix. 5. Return pork to the pan, stir-fry evenly, and serve with green onion shreds.

Ingredients: Pork tenderloin, wood ear mushrooms, carrots, green peppers, green onions, ginger, garlic, soy sauce, vinegar, sugar, cornstarch, chili peppers, cooking oil
Method: 1. Shred pork and marinate with soy sauce and cornstarch. 2. Soak and shred wood ear mushrooms, shred carrots and green peppers, mince green onions, ginger, and garlic. 3. Prepare Yu Xiang sauce: mix soy sauce, vinegar, sugar, cornstarch, and water. 4. Heat oil in a pan, stir-fry pork until it changes color, then remove. 5. SautÃ© green onions, ginger, garlic, and chili peppers in the pan, add vegetables and stir-fry, then add pork and Yu Xiang sauce, cooking until thickened.

Ingredients: Pork ribs, green onions, ginger, garlic, soy sauce, cooking wine, sugar, star anise, cooking oil
Method: 1. Rinse ribs and blanch to remove blood foam. 2. Heat oil in a pan, add sugar and cook until caramelized, then add ribs and stir-fry to coat. 3. Add green onions, ginger, garlic, and star anise, sautÃ© until fragrant, then add soy sauce and cooking wine. 4. Add water to cover the ribs, bring to a boil, then simmer for 40 minutes. 5. Reduce sauce over high heat and serve.

Method: 1. Cut pork belly into chunks and blanch to remove odor. 2. Heat oil in a pan, add sugar and cook until caramelized, then add pork belly and stir-fry to coat. 3. Reduce sauce over high heat until thick and serve.

Ingredients: Pork belly, potatoes, corn, green onions, ginger, soy sauce, cooking wine, sugar, cooking oil
Method: 1. Cut pork belly into chunks and blanch, dice potatoes, and cut corn into segments. 2. Heat oil in a pan, add sugar and cook until caramelized, then add pork belly and stir-fry to coat. 3. Add green onions and ginger, sautÃ© until fragrant, then add soy sauce and cooking wine. 4. Add potatoes and corn, cover with water, and simmer for 40 minutes. 5. Reduce sauce over high heat and serve.

Method: 1. Tenderize pork chop with the back of a knife, marinate with soy sauce, cooking wine, and cornstarch for 20 minutes. 2. Slice onion. 3. Heat oil in a pan, fry pork chop until golden on both sides, then remove. 4. Leave some oil in the pan, stir-fry onion until soft, season with sugar and soy sauce. 5. Return pork chop to the pan, stir-fry evenly, and serve.

Add pork shreds and stir-fry until they change color, then add pepper shreds and stir-fry. 5. Season with salt, stir well, and serve.

Method: 1. Slice pork, soak vermicelli until soft, cut cabbage into segments. 2. Heat oil in a pan, stir-fry pork until it changes color, add green onions and ginger and sautÃ©. 3. Add cabbage and stir-fry until soft, then add vermicelli. 4. Add water and soy sauce, bring to a boil, then simmer for 20 minutes. 5. Season with salt and serve.

Method: 1. Slice pork and marinate with cornstarch and egg for 20 minutes. 2. Dice tomatoes, cut green onions into segments. 3. Heat oil in a pan, stir-fry pork slices until they change color, then remove. 4. Leave some oil in the pan, cook tomatoes until juicy, add water and bring to a boil. 5. Add pork slices, season with salt, and cook for 2 minutes before serving.

Method: 1. Cut pork into strips and marinate with salt for 10 minutes. 2. Mix flour, cornstarch, and egg into a batter, coat pork strips. 3. Heat oil in a pan, fry pork strips until golden and crispy, then remove. 4. Leave some oil in the pan, add sugar, vinegar, and ketchup, stir-fry to make a sauce. 5. Add pork strips, stir-fry to coat with sauce, and serve.

Ingredients: Pork shoulder, honey, soy sauce, cooking wine, sugar, five-spice powder, garlic, cooking oil
Method: 1. Cut pork into long strips, marinate with soy sauce, cooking wine, sugar, five-spice powder, and minced garlic overnight. 2. Preheat oven/air fryer to 180Â°C, place pork on a rack, and brush with honey. 3. Bake for 30 minutes, flipping and brushing with honey every 10 minutes. 4. Bake until caramelized and serve.

Ingredients: Grass carp (or carp), green onions, ginger, garlic, soy sauce, cooking wine, sugar, salt, star anise, cooking oil
Method: 1. Clean and score both sides of the fish, marinate with cooking wine for 10 minutes. 2. Heat oil in a pan, fry the fish until golden on both sides. 3. Add green onions, ginger, and garlic, stir-fry until fragrant, then add soy sauce, sugar, cooking wine, and star anise. 4. Add water to cover the fish and simmer for 15 minutes. 5. Season with salt and reduce the sauce over high heat.

Ingredients: Fish fillet (grass carp), pickled mustard greens, bean sprouts, ginger, garlic, dried chili, Sichuan peppercorns, cooking wine, salt, egg white, cornstarch, cooking oil
Method: 1. Marinate fish slices with salt, cooking wine, egg white, and cornstarch. 2. Shred pickled mustard greens and blanch bean sprouts. 3. Heat oil in a pan, sautÃ© ginger, garlic, peppercorns, and dried chili, then add mustard greens. 4. Add water, bring to a boil, and cook fish slices. 5. Serve with hot oil poured over dried chili and peppercorn topping.

Ingredients: Fish fillet (grass carp), dried chili, Sichuan peppercorns, bean paste, ginger, garlic, bean sprouts, Chinese cabbage, cooking wine, cooking oil, salt
Method: 1. Marinate fish with salt and cooking wine, blanch vegetables and place at bottom. 2. Heat oil, sautÃ© ginger, garlic, and bean paste, then add chili and peppercorns. 3. Add water, bring to a boil, cook fish slices. 4. Pour over with hot oil infused with dried chili and peppercorns.

Ingredients: Oyster meat, green peppers, red peppers, green onions, ginger, soy sauce, salt, cooking oil
Method: 1. Rinse and drain oyster meat, shred green and red peppers, mince green onions and ginger. 2. Heat oil in a pan, sautÃ© green onions and ginger. 3. Add oyster meat and stir-fry until it changes color. 4. Add pepper shreds, stir-fry quickly, season with soy sauce and salt, and serve.

Method: 1. Devein and clean shrimp, marinate with cooking wine and cornstarch for 10 minutes. 2. Cut celery into segments, roast cashews. 3. Heat oil, sautÃ© green onion, ginger, garlic, dried chili, and peppercorns. 4. Stir-fry shrimp until pink, add celery and stir-fry. 5. Add mixed sauce of soy sauce, sugar, and vinegar, stir well, top with cashews and serve.

Method: 1. Trim and rinse shrimp. 2. Heat oil in a pan, fry shrimp until both sides turn red. 3. Add green onions, ginger, and garlic, sautÃ© until fragrant, then add soy sauce, cooking wine, and sugar. 4. Add a little water and braise for 5 minutes. 5. Reduce sauce over high heat and serve.

Method: 1. Cut squid into rings, marinate with cooking wine for 10 minutes. 2. Mince ginger and garlic, cut green onions into segments. 3. Heat oil in a pan, sautÃ© ginger and garlic. 4. Add squid rings and stir-fry quickly until they curl. 5. Season with soy sauce and salt, sprinkle with green onions, and serve.

Method: 1. Soak vermicelli until soft and place at the bottom of a dish, rinse oysters/shrimp/scallops and arrange on top. 2. Mince garlic, heat oil and sautÃ© until fragrant, add soy sauce to season. 3. Pour garlic sauce over the seafood. 4. Steam for 8-10 minutes after water boils. 5. Sprinkle with green onions and serve.

Add green onions and ginger, sautÃ© until fragrant, then add soy sauce and cola to cover the wings. 4. Bring to a boil, then simmer for 20 minutes. 5. Reduce sauce over high heat and serve.

Method: 1. Marinate chicken wings with cooking wine and soy sauce for 20 minutes, dice potatoes, cut green peppers into segments. 2. Heat oil in a pan, fry wings until golden. 3. Add green onions, ginger, and garlic, sautÃ© until fragrant, then add potatoes and green peppers, stir-fry. 4. Add water, soy sauce, and sugar, bring to a boil, then simmer for 30 minutes. 5. Reduce sauce over high heat and serve.

Method: 1. Cut chicken thigh into pieces, marinate with cooking wine and soy sauce for 15 minutes. 2. Cut green onions into segments, slice ginger. 3. Heat oil in a pan, fry chicken until golden on both sides. 4. Add green onions and ginger, sautÃ© until fragrant, then add soy sauce and sugar. 5. Add water, simmer for 20 minutes, then reduce sauce over high heat and serve.

Method: 1. Mash bean curd and mix with soy sauce, sugar, and minced garlic to make marinade. Marinate chicken wings for 2 hours. 2. Coat wings lightly with cornstarch. 3. Heat oil to 70% hot, deep-fry wings until golden and crispy. 4. Drain oil and serve.

Garlic: SautÃ© minced garlic and drizzle over; Honey: Brush with honey; Sweet & Sour: Stir-fry vinegar and sugar into a sauce and coat. 5. Serve.

Method: 1. Cut chicken into pieces, marinate with soy sauce for 15 minutes. 2. Crush garlic, mince green onions and ginger. 3. Heat oil in a pan, stir-fry chicken until it changes color. 4. Add green onions, ginger, and garlic, sautÃ© until fragrant, then add Chu Hou sauce and stir-fry evenly. 5. Add a little water, simmer for 5 minutes, and serve.

Ingredients: Chicken thigh, potatoes, shiitake mushrooms, green peppers, green onions, ginger, soy sauce, cooking wine, sugar, cooking oil
Method: 1. Cut chicken into pieces, marinate with cooking wine and soy sauce for 15 minutes. 2. Dice potatoes, soak and slice shiitake mushrooms, cut green peppers into segments. 3. Heat oil in a pan, stir-fry chicken until it changes color. 4. Add green onions and ginger, sautÃ© until fragrant, then add potatoes, mushrooms, and green peppers. 5. Add water, soy sauce, and sugar, simmer for 30 minutes, then reduce sauce over high heat and serve.

Ingredients: Chicken breast, garlic, soy sauce, cooking wine, salt, cooking oil
Method: 1. Slice chicken breast, marinate with soy sauce and cooking wine for 20 minutes. 2. Mince garlic. 3. Heat oil in a pan, fry chicken until golden on both sides. 4. Add minced garlic and sautÃ© until fragrant, season with salt. 5. Stir well and serve.

SautÃ© dried chili, peppercorns, green onion, ginger, garlic, then add onion and stir-fry. 4. Add chicken wings and bean paste, stir well, add potatoes. 5. Stir everything together and serve.

Ingredients: Chicken, potato, onion, dried chili, Sichuan peppercorns, broad bean paste, beer, soy sauce, green onion, ginger, garlic, cooking oil
Method: 1. Blanch chicken pieces to remove blood, cut potato into chunks, slice onion. 2. Heat oil, sautÃ© green onion, ginger, garlic, dried chili, peppercorns, and bean paste. 3. Add chicken, stir-fry until colored, then add beer and soy sauce, simmer 20 minutes. 4. Add potatoes and continue simmering 15 minutes. Finally add onion and stir to reduce sauce.

Ingredients: Chicken breast, peanuts, dried chili, Sichuan peppercorns, green onion, ginger, garlic, soy sauce, sugar, vinegar, cornstarch, salt, cooking oil
Method: 1. Dice chicken breast and marinate with soy sauce and cornstarch for 15 minutes. 2. Cut dried chili, mince green onion, ginger, garlic, and roast peanuts. 3. Heat oil, sautÃ© peppercorns and dried chili, add chicken and stir-fry until color changes. 4. Add aromatics and prepared sweet-sour sauce, stir well. 5. Add peanuts, stir-fry evenly, and serve.

Ingredients: Chicken, Sichuan peppercorns, dried chilies, green onions, ginger, garlic, soy sauce, vinegar, sugar, cooking oil
Method: 1. Cook chicken, shred it, rinse with cold water, and drain. 2. Cut green onions into segments, mince ginger and garlic, cut dried chilies into segments. 3. Heat oil in a pan, sautÃ© Sichuan peppercorns and dried chilies, then remove and set aside. 4. Mix sauce: soy sauce, vinegar, sugar, and the sautÃ©ed pepper-chili oil. 5. Pour sauce over chicken shreds, mix well, sprinkle with green onions, and serve.

Ingredients: Chicken breast, sesame paste, cucumber, green onion, ginger, garlic, soy sauce, vinegar, sugar, cooking oil
Method: 1. Boil chicken breast and shred, slice cucumber into thin strips. 2. Mix sesame paste with soy sauce, vinegar, sugar, and warm water to make sauce. 3. Mince green onion, ginger, and garlic. 4. Combine all ingredients and mix well. 5. Let sit for 5 minutes before serving.

Ingredients: Cucumber, garlic, soy sauce, vinegar, sugar, chili oil, cooking oil
Method: 1. Rinse cucumber, smash and cut into chunks. 2. Mince garlic. 3. Mix sauce: soy sauce, vinegar, sugar, and chili oil. 4. Pour sauce over cucumber and mix well. 5. Let sit for 10 minutes before serving.

Method: 1. Cut tofu into small cubes, blanch in boiling water, then rinse with cold water and drain. 2. Cut green onions into segments, mince garlic. 3. Mix sauce: soy sauce, vinegar, sugar, and chili oil. 4. Pour sauce over tofu and mix well. 5. Sprinkle with green onions and serve.

Method: 1. Peel and cut century egg into pieces, cut tofu into small cubes, blanch, rinse with cold water, and drain. 2. Cut green onions into segments. 3. Mix sauce: soy sauce, vinegar, and sugar. 4. Place century egg and tofu in a dish, pour sauce over and mix well. 5. Sprinkle with green onions and serve.

Method: 1. Cut duck into pieces and blanch to remove odor. 2. Heat oil in a pan, stir-fry duck until oil renders. 3. Add green onions, ginger, garlic, star anise, and dried chilies, sautÃ© until fragrant. 4. Pour in beer and soy sauce, bring to a boil, then simmer for 40 minutes. 5. Reduce sauce over high heat and serve.

Roast in the oven for 1.5 hours, flipping and brushing with honey every 20 minutes. 4. Roast until skin is crispy and meat is tender, slice and serve with green onion shreds.

Ingredients: Lamb, carrots, potatoes, tomatoes, onions, rosemary, red wine, salt, black pepper, olive oil

Ingredients: Beef tail or brisket, tomatoes, onion, carrots, green onions, ginger, soy sauce, cooking wine, sugar, salt, cooking oil
Method: 1. Cut beef tail or brisket into chunks and blanch to remove blood foam. 2. Dice tomatoes, onion, and carrots, mince green onions and ginger. 3. Heat oil in a pan, sautÃ© green onions and ginger, then add beef and stir-fry until slightly browned. 4. Add tomatoes, onion, and carrots, stir-fry, and season with soy sauce, cooking wine, and sugar. 5. Add water to cover ingredients, bring to a boil, then simmer for 1.5 hours, season with salt, and serve.

Method: 1. Blanch beef to remove blood foam. 2. Add water to a pot with green onions, ginger, star anise, cinnamon, soy sauce, cooking wine, and sugar, bring to a boil. 3. Add beef and simmer for 2 hours. 4. Season with salt and simmer for another 30 minutes. 5. Remove, cool, and slice to serve.

Slice bacon into small pieces, mince garlic. 4. Heat oil in a pan, fry bacon until oil renders. 5. Add minced garlic and sautÃ© until fragrant, then add air-fried kale and stir-fry until soft. 6. Season with salt, honey, and black pepper, stir well, and serve.

notes.en:
Ingredients: Rice, meat (chicken thigh / cured pork / Chinese sausage / beef), egg, light soy sauce, dark soy sauce, oyster sauce, sesame oil, cooking wine, cooking oil, salt, sugar, black pepper, chopped scallions, water
Instructions: 1. Soak the rice in water for 30 minutes.
2. Marinate the meat (beef or chicken thigh) with 1 tbsp each of light soy sauce, dark soy sauce, sesame oil, cooking wine, oyster sauce, 1 tbsp of starch, and a small amount of black pepper.
3. Brush oil on the bottom of an enamel pot, spread the rice, add water (water-to-rice ratio 1:1), bring to a boil over high heat, then cover and simmer on low heat for 10 minutes.
4. Add the marinated meat / Chinese sausage / cured pork evenly, cover, and continue to simmer on low heat for another 10 minutes.
5. Drizzle a ring of oil (to create crispy rice crust), crack in an egg, cover and simmer on low heat for 5 more minutes.
6. Sprinkle chopped scallions before serving.
7. Sauce: Mix 3 tbsp light soy sauce, 1 tbsp dark soy sauce, 1 tbsp oyster sauce, 1 tsp salt, 3 tsp sugar, Â½ tsp white pepper, Â½ tsp sesame oil, and 4 tbsp water.

Add a little oil, sautÃ© green onions and ginger, add green peppers and stir-fry until soft. 4. Return pork to the pan, season with salt, stir well, and serve over cooked noodles.

Ingredients: Noodles, beef, green onions, ginger, star anise, soy sauce, salt, cooking oil
Method: 1. Cut beef into chunks and blanch to remove blood foam. 2. Heat oil in a pan, sautÃ© green onions, ginger, and star anise, add beef and stir-fry. 3. Add water, bring to a boil, simmer for 1 hour, season with soy sauce and salt. 4. Cook noodles, drain, and place in beef broth. 5. Sprinkle with green onions and serve.

Method: 1. Blanch ribs, peel and cut yam, cut corn into pieces. 2. Add ribs and ginger to boiling water. 3. Simmer 40 mins, add yam and cook 20 more mins, season with salt.

Ingredients: Wood ear mushrooms, tofu, pork shreds, egg, vinegar, white pepper, soy sauce, cornstarch, cooking oil
Method: 1. Soak and shred wood ear mushrooms, cut tofu into strips, marinate pork shreds. 2. Heat oil in a pot, stir-fry pork until it changes color, add wood ear and tofu. 3. Add water and bring to a boil, season with vinegar, white pepper, and soy sauce. 4. Thicken with cornstarch slurry, pour in egg to form egg flowers. 5. Cook for 1 minute and serve.

Method: 1. Steam pumpkin and mash into a puree. 2. Mix eggs, heavy cream, sugar, cinnamon, and ginger powder, then stir in pumpkin puree. 3. Pour mixture into pie crust. 4. Bake in a preheated 180Â°C oven for 40-50 minutes. 5. Bake until filling sets, cool, and serve.

Method: 1. Brew black tea with hot water for 5 minutes. 2. Add milk and sugar, heat over low flame while stirring until sugar dissolves. 3. Turn off heat just before boiling. 4. Strain tea leaves, pour into a cup. 5. Serve hot or with ice.

Ingredients: Matcha powder, milk, sugar or honey, water
Method: 1. Mix matcha powder with a little hot water into a paste. 2. Heat milk until warm, stir in sugar or honey. 3. Pour matcha paste into milk, stir well. 4. Optionally top with foam. 5. Serve hot or over ice.
